product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Singlet - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked singlet features seamless construction and FlashDry(TM) technology for quick-drying comfort when racing or training. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Stretchy ventilation panels along the sides of the torso and down the back increase breathability; stitchless seams reduce chafing. Reflective logos increase your visibility in low light. The Better Than Naked singlet is part of The North Face Flight Series(TM), developed and tested by outdoor athletes. Closeout.
short_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked singlet features seamless construction and FlashDry(TM) technology for quick-drying comfort when racing or training.
